name: Stuffed Filet Mignon Bites
author: MattR
summary: Bite-sized cuts of filet mignon are stuffed with jalapeno-spiked cream cheese, wrapped in bacon, and grilled. This dish is very popular with our tailgating crowd at football games. Its very easy to prepare and only takes a few minutes to grill.
directions: Slice the steaks into 1/2-inch wide strips
Pound the strips to about half their original thickness
Place the steak in a bowl; pour the Italian dressing over the meat; allow to marinate at least 2 hours
Mix together the cream cheese and jalapeno pepper in a bowl; set aside
Remove the strips from the marinade and lay out on a flat surface
Spread about 1 teaspoon of the cream cheese mixture on each strip
Preheat an outdoor grill for high heat and lightly oil grate
Remove the strips from the marinade and lay on a flat surface
Spread about 1 teaspoon of the cream cheese mixture on each strip
Fold the meat around the cream cheese mixture to form a ball
Wrap each ball with a slice of bacon
Secure bacon with water-soaked toothpicks or metal skewers
Cook on preheated grill until steak is no longer pink, about 4 minutes per side
